name: Maldark: Conqueror of All Worlds
storyline: Stop Maldark, a ruthless and narcissistic sorcerer whose only mission is to seek out new worlds and destroy or conquer them.
summary: Maldark: Conqueror of All Words is a game where users can complete quests to level up. The game contains avatar creation to be able to play it. Each avatar has a special weapon to help them fight enemies and complete quests.
